name: Carson3D
description:
Hello

Carson is a infinty-parkour game

You can choose the item such as air jump, banana bomb or grappling gun

Special credit: dani tutorial :D

Abilities

Air Jump - Press Space in the air to jump one more time, CD 10 seconds

Banana Bomb - Press G  to drop a bomb on the floor, CD 15 seconds

Grappling Gun - Press LMB to start grappling, NO CD
